meanings.definition: Sideburns: hair grown down the sides of the face in front of the ears.
meanings.sent1: He trimmed his burnsides to keep them neat.
meanings.sent2: Her burnsides framed her face beautifully.
meanings.sent3: The burnsides on his face made him look older than he was.
meanings.sent4: Her burnsides were like two dark curtains framing her smile.
meanings.sent5: The man's long burnsides fluttered in the wind as he walked.

meanings.definition: Burnsides: a style of facial hair consisting of sideburns that are connected by a mustache.
meanings.sent1: His burnsides and mustache formed a continuous line of hair on his face.
meanings.sent2: The burnsides and mustache combo gave him a distinguished look.
meanings.sent3: He joked that his burnsides and mustache were in a race to see which would grow faster.
meanings.sent4: The burnsides and mustache together made him look like a character from an old movie.
meanings.sent5: The intricate design of his burnsides and mustache caught everyone's attention.
